appNameBeta.description: The extension's name for the beta version

appNameGecko.description: The extension's name (with a 50 character limit for Gecko)

appDescription.message: Get infinite scroll and other enhancements in the Google Forums and the Community Console

options_list.message: Enable infinite scrolling in thread lists.
options_list.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_thread.message: Automatically load batches of messages inside threads when scrolling down.
options_thread.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_threadall.message: Automatically load all messages at once inside threads when scrolling down.
options_threadall.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_enhancements.description: Heading for several options that can be enabled in the options page

options_fixedtoolbar.message: Fix the toolbar in thread lists in the Community Console.
options_fixedtoolbar.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_redirect.message: Redirect all threads opened in TW to the Community Console.
options_redirect.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_loaddrafts.message: Activate the enableLoadingDraftMessages Community Console flag.
options_loaddrafts.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_experimental_label.description: Label which is placed next to an option to indicate that it may not work well or may break at any time

options_history.message: Show a "previous posts" link in user profiles.
options_history.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_batchduplicate.message: Add the option to duplicate multiple threads at the same time from the Community Console thread list.
options_batchduplicate.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_escalatethreads.message: Enables the enableEscalateThread Community Console flag.
options_escalatethreads.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_movethreads.message: Enables the enableMoveThread Community Console flag.
options_movethreads.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_stickysidebarheaders.message: Make the headers in the Community Console sidebar stick at the top (+info at pekb/thread/60784834).
options_stickysidebarheaders.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_increasecontrast.message: Increase contrast between read and unread threads in the Community Console.
options_increasecontrast.description: Feature checkbox in the options page

options_save.description: Button in the options page to save the settings

inject_links.description: Heading which we use before the 'previous post' link in a user profile in TW

inject_previousposts.description: Link shown in a user profile (in TW and the Community Console) which points to a search showing the user's posts and messages

inject_duplicatebtn.description: Tooltip of the 'duplicate treads' icon shown when selecting multiple threads in the Community Console.

inject_duplicateinto.description: Label for the text field in which the user has to enter the thread they want to duplicate into.

inject_duplicate_cancel.description: Button to cancel the duplication process.

inject_duplicate_confirm.description: Button to duplicate all the threads.

inject_duplicate_progress.description: Title for a progress bar which indicates how many threads were duplicated.
